name: The Box (itch) (carlosgonzalez)
description:
The Box is a small PlayStation Move game where you need to solve puzzles inside a room, rotating it using the PSMoves connected to the computer.

THERE IS AS WELL A NON PSMOVE VERSION AVAILABLE.

Please, note that the PSMove version is only for 64bit systems, and require you to set up the controller following this simple tutorial (libusb driver for the camera): https://github.com/HipsterSloth/psmove-unity5/wiki...

PSMove Controls:


Zoom: Hold both X Buttons and move the controllers closer or further away to each other to control Zoom.

Rotation: See How To Play inside the game.

Roll: Move Up/Down 1 PSMove while holding both Triggers to control the Roll
Pitch: Move Up/Down both PSMove while holding both Triggers to control the Pitch
Yaw: Pull/Push 1 PSMove while holding both Triggers to control the Yaw

Mouse/Keyboard Controls:

Zoom: Up/Down Arrow Keys

Rotation:

Roll: Lef/Right Arrow Keys

Pitch: Hold Left Click and Swipe Up/Down

Yaw: Hold Left Click and Swipe Left/Right
